mapper.select: select rownum, dis_mlist.* from ( select row_number() over ( partition by v_mlist.m_id order by v_mlist.m_id ) as rnum, v_mlist.* from v_mlist ) dis_mlist where rnum = 1
select position_id, position_name, position_enabled from position order by position_id

SELECT rownum, dis_mlist.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over ( partition by v_mlist.m_id order by v_mlist.m_id ) as rnum, v_mlist.* from v_mlist ) dis_mlist WHERE rnum = 1 AND dis_mlist.position like '%${position}%'

SELECT rownum, dis_mlist.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over ( partition by v_mlist.m_id order by v_mlist.m_id ) as rnum, v_mlist.* from v_mlist ) dis_mlist WHERE rnum = 1 AND dis_mlist.m_nick like '%${nickname}%'
